mapper.update: update user set phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_actived = #{isActived,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select user_id, phone, password, user_name, register_time, is_actived from user

SELECT u1.user_id,u1.phone,u1.`password`,u1.user_name,u1.is_actived from user u LEFT JOIN user_friends uf ON uf.user_id=u.user_id LEFT JOIN user u1 on u1.user_id=uf.friend_id WHERE u.user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT d.device_id as deviceId , d.device_ver as deviceVer, d.sensor_count as sensorCount, d.driver_count as driverCount, d.io_cfg as ioCfg, d.sampling_period as samplingPeriod, d.io_cfg_time as ioCfgTime, d.is_online as isOnline,d.online_time as onlineTime, d.sinario_cfg as sinarioCfg, d.sinario_cfg_time as sinarioCfgTime,d.user_id as userId,d.user_phone as userPhone FROM device d WHERE d.user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT count(1) from user u INNER JOIN user_friends uf ON uf.user_id=u.user_id INNER JOIN user u1 on u1.user_id=uf.friend_id WHERE u.user_id= #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT u.phone as phone,d.device_id as deviceId , d.device_ver as deviceVer, d.sensor_count as sensorCount, d.driver_count as driverCount, d.io_cfg as ioCfg, d.sampling_period as samplingPeriod, d.io_cfg_time as ioCfgTime, d.is_online as isOnline,d.online_time as onlineTime, d.sinario_cfg as sinarioCfg, d.sinario_cfg_time as sinarioCfgTime from `share` s LEFT JOIN device d on s.device_id=d.device_id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.user_id=s.user_id where s.share_id =#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} limit #{start,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT count(1) from `share` s LEFT JOIN device d on s.device_id=d.device_id LEFT JOIN user u ON u.user_id=s.user_id where s.share_id =#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
